response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest standards and expectations. We believe its value aligns perfectly with your needs, offering a solution that could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its worth of $10,000 to you, we are offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $9,500. This exclusive opportunity is designed to ensure you receive unparalleled quality at an attractive cost, allowing you to maximize your investment. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 9500}
